attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment to those who murdered "Baby P"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose this petition to make the Government realise the frustration of the voting public having seen the disgusting events surrounding the alleged murder of Baby P.

The people responsible in my opinion should be humilated and made to pay publicly in front of the nation.

Please sign this petition and forward to as many friends, colleagues and family members to sign as quickly as possible

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
